name: A Beautiful Life
description:
"A Beautiful Life" is a prototype game for a future project that I plan to work on soon outside of another project.

This project won't be as finished and I won't work on it for several years unlike "Once Awake", my other game in preparation.

I put a WebGL version of the game but I'm not sure it works very well. If you want to play a bit, I put a .zip file of the game to download.

The game currently has no mechanics but I plan to add some in the future.

On that note, have a great day and see you next time!
